short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmarks, Color markers and Drag & Drop Tag tree - Create your private Library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1、Attach colored sticky to webpages as a reminders
2、Create groups to pool and share resources
3、Bookmarks,help you build a large, clear personal library
4、drag and drop your tag, you can easily and quickly organize your collections
5、Import bookmarks: One-click to quickly import browser bookmarks and preserve the bookmark structure
6、Drawing pictures on websites
